alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Morgan; Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN...WEST CENTRAL ANDERSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wartburg, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wartburg, Harriman, Oakdale, Pine Orchard, Rosedale, Frozen Head State Park, Slick Rock, Petros, and Coalfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
